snippet.title: Pitfall: The Mayan Adventure Trailer 1994
snippet.description:
Pitfall: The Mayan Adventure Trailer 1994

Official Content From Activision

YOU are the only one who can save Pitfall Harry from the Evil Mayan Warrior. YOU'LL have to go through rainforests, waterfalls and abandoned mines. Hurry, YOUR time is running out!
Platforms: Sega Genesis, Super Nintendo

Sega Genesis, Super Nintendo
, Quest,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Pitfall: The Mayan Adventure
